entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
